netthar：，nitthar m．[＜nittharati] 滅罪，贖罪，免罪之道．
netthar：，nitthar m．[＜nittharati] 滅罪，贖罪，罪を免れる道．

Netthar，[see nittharati； does any connection exist with Vedic neṣṭṛ?] only in phrase netthāraṁ vattati to behave in such a way as to get rid of blame or fault Vin．II，5； III，183； M．I，442．-- Bdhgh on Vin．II，5 （p．309） explains：nittharantānaṁ etan ti netthāraṁ yena sakkā nissāraṇā nittharituṁ taṁ aṭṭhārasa-vidhaṁ sammāvattuṁ vattantī ti attho．（Page 377）
